articles.title: Indiana officers honor slain deputy shot during chase
articles.description: INDIANAPOLIS (AP) — Several dozen police officers saluted the flag-draped body of a slain central Indiana sheriff's deputy as it was taken from a hospital Monday three days after he was shot during a chase.

articles.author: By Jeff Parrott South Bend Tribune
articles.title: Few details on Mishawaka Police chase investigation as driver is buried
articles.description: SOUTH BEND — As hundreds of bikers paid last respects to John M. “Indian John” Williams at his funeral Thursday, police and prosecutors were keeping a tight lid on an investigation into his death.

articles.author: By Rick Callahan Associated Press
articles.title: Indiana prosecutor: Trump's comments on crash that killed Colts player 'ghoulish'
articles.description: INDIANAPOLIS — An Indiana prosecutor blasted President Donald Trump on Wednesday for politicizing the case of an immigrant charged in a drunken-driving crash that killed Indianapolis Colts linebacker Edwin Jackson and another man, saying his and others' comme…
